text: Kenneth Hurst "Ken" Thompson (24 April 1926 - February 2008) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back in the Football League for Gateshead and York City, and was on the books of Middlesbrough without making a league appearance. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Middlesbrough F.C. players Category:Gateshead F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Ken Thompson (footballer, born 1926)
